name: Minecraft
gameInfo: Minecraft is cool and fun game where you explore a big world full of surprises. The game even has portals to dimensions.

name: GTA V
gameInfo: Grand Theft Auto V is an action-adventure game played from either a third-person or first-person perspective.Players complete missions scenarios with set objectivesâ€”to progress.

name: Fortnite
gameInfo: Fortnite Battle Royale is a player-versus-player game for up to 100 players, allowing one to play alone, in a duo, or in a squad

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
gameInfo: The game is an installment of The Legend of Zelda series and is set at the end of its timeline.The player controls an amnesiac Link, who awakens from a hundred-year slumber , and attempts to regain his memories

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
gameInfo: After a robbery goes badly wrong in the western town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee.  With federal agents and the best bounty hunters in the nation massing on their heels, the gang must rob  their way across the rugged heartland of America

name: Roblox
gameInfo: Roblox is an online game platform and game creation system developed by Roblox Corporation that allows users to program games and play games created by other users.The platform hosts user-created games of multiple genres coded in the programming language Lua.

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
gameInfo: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim is an action role-playing game, playable from either a first or third-person perspective.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
gameInfo: The game takes place in a realistic and modern setting. The campaign follows a CIA officer and British SAS forces as they team up with rebels from the fictional country of Urzikstan, combating together against Russian forces who have invaded the country and the terrorist group Al-Qatala.

name: FIFA 22
gameInfo: FUT 22 redesigns Division Rivals and FUT Champions to create a more accessible way to test your skills and progress against other players.
